title: ‘Barry’ Season 3, Episode 1 Recap With Bill Hader
description:
Sean Fennessey is joined by Bill Hader to recap Season 3, Episode 1 of HBO’s ‘Barry.’ Sean and Bill discuss the events of the episode, as well as how Bill approached writing this season after so much time has passed since Season 2.
Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Bill Hader
Producer: Bobby Wagner
